ThingDef.label: sun lamp
ThingDef.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (red)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in red.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (green)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in green.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (blue)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in blue.

ThingDef.label: ceiling lamp
ThingDef.description: A ceiling mounted light that lights an area.

ThingDef.label: Wall light
ThingDef.description: Wall light that lights an area. Must be placed on a wall.

ThingDef.label: floor light (square)
ThingDef.description: Square floor light integraded into the ground. Waterproof and quite pretty.

ThingDef.label: floor light (stripe)
ThingDef.description: Stripe floor light integraded into the ground. Waterproof and quite pretty.

ThingDef.label: floor light (small stripe)
ThingDef.description: Small stripe floor light integraded into the ground. Waterproof and quite pretty.

ThingDef.label: outdoor lamp
ThingDef.description: An outdoor lamp designed to light a large area. It's pretty to look at too.

ThingDef.label: Advanced outdoor lamp
ThingDef.description: An outdoor lamp designed to light a huge area. It's very pretty to look at too.

ThingDef.label: porch lamp
ThingDef.description: An outdoor lamp designed to light a small area.

ThingDef.label: Path light
ThingDef.description: Small light with built in solar panel that lights an area.

ThingDef.label: Metallic Locker
ThingDef.Description: Metallic plated locker, can store clothes. Also comes with dust conctrator unit for that good ancient feeling. \nImproves Comfort and Cleanliness when placed near beds by 10%.

ThingDef.label: Cabinet
ThingDef.Description: Place where you can seal your socks with a 20 digit code. \nImproves Rest Effectiveness when placed near beds by 10%. Allows colonists to change their apparel color

ThingDef.label: sleeping spot
ThingDef.Description: Designates a spot on the ground where people should sleep. Not comfortable. Rest effectiveness: 90%

ThingDef.label: hide bed
ThingDef.Description: A simple bed made of wood planks and animal hides. Rest effectiveness: 95%

ThingDef.label: double bed
ThingDef.Description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people. Rest effectiveness: 95%

ThingDef.label: royal bed
ThingDef.Description: A luxurious gold-inlaid bed fit for the highborn. Very comfy and beautiful. Fits two. Rest effectiveness: 105%

ThingDef.label: hospital bed
ThingDef.Description: A bed specially designed for injured people. Improves chance of successful medical work. Rest effectiveness: 100%

ThingDef.label: Luxury bed
ThingDef.Description: Luxury bed. Pretty. Rest effectiveness: 110%

ThingDef.label: Sleeping pod
ThingDef.Description: Redesigned cryo pod, with almost 40% guarantee that you wont get frozen. Rest effectiveness: 115%

ThingDef.label: dining chair
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair for sitting at a table.

ThingDef.label: armchair
ThingDef.description: A large, soft, comfy seat. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.label: linkable stool
ThingDef.description: People sit here.

ThingDef.label: Couch
ThingDef.Description: It's not making colonists lazy, in theory. Provide Adjacency Bonus for Modern Table (Medium) and Modern Table (Small)

ThingDef.label: Comfy Seat
ThingDef.Description: Old fashioned, comfy, and mostly out of cloth. Or so they say. Provide Adjacency Bonus for Modern Table (Medium) and Modern Table (Small)

ThingDef.label: Redesigned Stool
ThingDef.Description: Small, durable, handy in bar fights. Provide Adjacency Bonus for Modern Table (Square)

ThingDef.label: Modern Table (Small)
ThingDef.Description: Small table for those antisocial types

ThingDef.label: Modern Table (Medium)
ThingDef.Description: Medium size table

ThingDef.label: Modern Table (Square)
ThingDef.Description: Standart square table, just a bit tougher.

ThingDef.label: Serving Table (cooled)
ThingDef.Description: Small floor mounted freezer, keeps food fresh

ThingDef.Name: MatBase
ThingDef.description: A door mat to clean your feet. Keeps your base clean.

ThingDef.label: animal bed
ThingDef.description: A soft bed for animals to sleep on. Fits any animal.

ThingDef.label: Auto Trashbin
ThingDef.Description: Auto trashbin. Comes with a short range cleaning robot.

ThingDef.Label: Muffalo Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Muffalo fur.

ThingDef.Label: Boomrat Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Boomrat fur.

ThingDef.Label: Squirrel Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Squirrel fur.

ThingDef.Label: Human Rug
ThingDef.Description: Holy crap, that's a human!

ThingDef.Label: Deer Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Deer fur.

ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Iguana skin.

ThingDef.Label: Megascarab Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from a Megascarab shell.

ThingDef.Label: Rhinoceros Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Rhinoceros skin.

ThingDef.Label: Dromedary Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Dromedary fur.

ThingDef.Label: Tortoise Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Tortoise shell.

ThingDef.Label: Cobra Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Cobra skin.

ThingDef.Label: Monkey Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Monkey fur.

ThingDef.Label: Boar Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Boar fur.

ThingDef.Label: Beaver Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Beaver fur.

ThingDef.Label: Elk Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Elk fur.

ThingDef.Label: Hare Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Hare fur.

ThingDef.Label: Warg Rug
ThingDef.Description: A lovely rug made from Hare fur.

ThingDef.label: Food Basket
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry raw food here for storage.

ThingDef.label: Pallet
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry materials here for storage.

ThingDef.label: Skip
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry materials here for storage.

ThingDef.label: Medicine Cabinet
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry medicine here for storage.

ThingDef.label: Deep Storage Unit Mk.I
ThingDef.description: A contained unit for storing up to 1000 of a single item.

ThingDef.label: Deep Storage Unit Mk.II
ThingDef.description: A contained unit for storing up to 1500 of a single item.

ThingDef.label: Deep Storage Unit Mk.III
ThingDef.description: A contained unit for storing up to 2250 of a single item.

ThingDef.label: small quantum stockpile
ThingDef.description: Placed underneath stockpile zones in order to store more than one item or stack of items in a given space.

ThingDef.label: quantum stockpile
ThingDef.description: Placed underneath stockpile zones in order to store more than one item or stack of items in a given space.

ThingDef.label: small quantum relay
ThingDef.description: Connects to any quantum warehouse anywhere in the colony to transfer items and chunks back and forth.

ThingDef.label: quantum relay
ThingDef.description: Connects to any quantum warehouse anywhere in the colony to transfer items and chunks back and forth.

ThingDef.label: small quantum warehouse
ThingDef.description: Place underneath stockpile zones to network all of the zone's quantum storage devices; also acts like a quantum stockpile.

ThingDef.label: quantum warehouse
ThingDef.description: Place underneath stockpile zones to network all of the zone's quantum storage devices; also acts like a quantum stockpile.
